verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> of Korah כְּאַיָּ֗ל <S%H354><s%> As the hart תַּעֲרֹ֥ג <S%H6165><s%> panteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲפִֽיקֵי־ <S%H650><s%> brooks מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> after the water כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> So נַפְשִׁ֨י <S%H5315><s%> my soul תַעֲרֹ֖ג <S%H6165><s%> so panteth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> after thee O God

צָמְאָ֬ה <S%H6770><s%> thirsteth נַפְשִׁ֨י ׀ <S%H5315><s%> My soul לֵאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> for God לְאֵ֪ל <S%H410><s%> God חָ֥י <S%H2416><s%> for the living מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> When אָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> when shall I come וְ֝אֵרָאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> and appear פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

הָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> have been לִּ֬י דִמְעָתִ֣י <S%H1832><s%> My tears לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> have been my meat יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night בֶּאֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> say אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> while they continually אַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אֶזְכְּרָ֨ה ׀ <S%H2142><s%> When I remember וְאֶשְׁפְּכָ֬ה <S%H8210><s%> these [things] I pour out עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> within נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶֽעֱבֹ֨ר ׀ <S%H5674><s%> in me for I had gone בַּסָּךְ֮ <S%H5519><s%> with the multitude אֶדַּדֵּ֗ם <S%H1718><s%> I went עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> with them to the house אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> of God בְּקוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> with the voice רִנָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> of joy וְתוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> and praise הָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> with a multitude חוֹגֵֽג׃ <S%H2287><s%> that kept holyday

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י ׀ <S%H7817><s%> Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> any וַתֶּהֱמִ֪י <S%H1993><s%> disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <S%H5921><s%> within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <S%H3176><s%> in me? hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> thou in God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> shall again אוֹדֶ֗נּוּ <S%H3034><s%> for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <S%H3444><s%> him [for] the help פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> of his countenance

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> O my God עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> within נַפְשִׁ֪י <S%H5315><s%> my soul תִשְׁתּ֫וֹחָ֥ח <S%H7817><s%> is cast down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> within כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶ֭זְכָּרְךָ <S%H2142><s%> within me therefore will I remember מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee from the land יַרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan וְ֝חֶרְמוֹנִ֗ים <S%H2769><s%> and of the Hermonites מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> from the hill מִצְעָֽר׃ <S%H4706><s%> Mizar תְּהֽוֹם־ <S%H8415><s%> confusion אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about

תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> Deep ק֭וֹרֵא <S%H7121><s%> calleth לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the noise צִנּוֹרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6794><s%> of thy waterspouts כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <S%H4867><s%> all thy waves וְ֝גַלֶּ֗יךָ <S%H1530><s%> and thy billows עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> are gone

יוֹמָ֤ם ׀ <S%H3119><s%> in the daytime יְצַוֶּ֬ה <S%H6680><s%> will command יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> [Yet] the LORD חַסְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> his lovingkindness וּ֭בַלַּיְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and in the night [שִׁירָהּ כ] (שִׁירֹ֣ו <S%H7892><s%> musical ק) עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> with תְּ֝פִלָּ֗ה <S%H8605><s%> [shall be] with me [and] my prayer לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> unto the God חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> of my life

אוֹמְרָ֤ה ׀ <S%H559><s%> I will say לְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> unto God סַלְעִי֮ <S%H5553><s%> my rock לָמָ֪ה <S%H4100><s%> Why שְׁכַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <S%H7911><s%> Why hast thou forgotten לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> I mourning אֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go בְּלַ֣חַץ <S%H3906><s%> because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> of the enemy

בְּרֶ֤צַח ׀ <S%H7524><s%> [As] with a sword בְּֽעַצְמוֹתַ֗י <S%H6106><s%> in my bones חֵרְפ֥וּנִי <S%H2778><s%> reproach צוֹרְרָ֑י <S%H6887><s%> mine enemies בְּאָמְרָ֥ם <S%H559><s%> me while they say אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily אַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י ׀ <S%H7817><s%> Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> any וּֽמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <S%H1993><s%> become עָ֫לָ֥י <S%H5921><s%> within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <S%H3176><s%> within me? hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> thou in God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> shall yet אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3034><s%> for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <S%H3444><s%> him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> and my God
